trans-unit.source: Get Block List
trans-unit.target: Get Block List

trans-unit.source: Get Block List
trans-unit.target: Get Block List

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation retrieves the list of blocks that have been uploaded as part of a block blob.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation retrieves the list of blocks that have been uploaded as part of a block blob.

trans-unit.source: There are two block lists maintained for a blob:
trans-unit.target: There are two block lists maintained for a blob:

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Committed Block List:</embeddedLabel> The list of blocks that have been successfully committed to a given blob with <link xlink:href="c864893e-d758-475a-b419-af0c60dd2569" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Block List</link>.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Committed Block List:</embeddedLabel> The list of blocks that have been successfully committed to a given blob with <link xlink:href="c864893e-d758-475a-b419-af0c60dd2569" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Block List</link>.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Uncommitted Block List:</embeddedLabel> The list of blocks that have been uploaded for a blob using <link xlink:href="de63a7ed-c489-4034-b21a-246854d7a745" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Block</link>, but that have not yet been committed.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Uncommitted Block List:</embeddedLabel> The list of blocks that have been uploaded for a blob using <link xlink:href="de63a7ed-c489-4034-b21a-246854d7a745" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Block</link>, but that have not yet been committed.

trans-unit.source: These blocks are stored in Azure in association with a blob, but do not yet form part of the blob.
trans-unit.target: These blocks are stored in Azure in association with a blob, but do not yet form part of the blob.

trans-unit.source: You can call <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> to return the committed block list, the uncommitted block list, or both lists.
trans-unit.target: You can call <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> to return the committed block list, the uncommitted block list, or both lists.

trans-unit.source: You can also call this operation to retrieve the committed block list for a snapshot.
trans-unit.target: You can also call this operation to retrieve the committed block list for a snapshot.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.

trans-unit.source: HTTPS is recommended.
trans-unit.target: HTTPS is recommended.

trans-unit.source: Replace <placeholder>myaccount</placeholder> with the name of your storage account:
trans-unit.target: Replace <placeholder>myaccount</placeholder> with the name of your storage account:

trans-unit.source: GET Method Request URI
trans-unit.target: GET Method Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: Emulated Storage Service URI
trans-unit.target: Emulated Storage Service URI

trans-unit.source: When making a request against the emulated storage service, specify the emulator hostname and Blob service port as <codeInline>127.0.0.1:10000</codeInline>, followed by the emulated storage account name:
trans-unit.target: When making a request against the emulated storage service, specify the emulator hostname and Blob service port as <codeInline>127.0.0.1:10000</codeInline>, followed by the emulated storage account name:

trans-unit.source: GET Method Request URI
trans-unit.target: GET Method Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.target: For more information, see <legacyLink xlink:href="f0e3acde-f019-4148-9544-34cf2ff27211" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Using the Azure Storage Emulator for Development and Testing</legacyLink>.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: The following additional parameters may be specified on the request URI.
trans-unit.target: The following additional parameters may be specified on the request URI.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameter
trans-unit.target: URI Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: The snapshot parameter is an opaque <languageKeyword>DateTime</languageKeyword> value that, when present, specifies the blob list to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: The snapshot parameter is an opaque <languageKeyword>DateTime</languageKeyword> value that, when present, specifies the blob list to retrieve.

trans-unit.source: For more information on working with blob snapshots, see <link xlink:href="5614e5d3-58cb-42ee-9db6-d90de86196cd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Working with Snapshots</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information on working with blob snapshots, see <link xlink:href="5614e5d3-58cb-42ee-9db6-d90de86196cd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Working with Snapshots</link>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to return the list of committed blocks, the list of uncommitted blocks, or both lists together.
trans-unit.target: Specifies whether to return the list of committed blocks, the list of uncommitted blocks, or both lists together.

trans-unit.source: Valid values are <languageKeyword>committed</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>uncommitted</languageKeyword>, or <languageKeyword>all</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: Valid values are <languageKeyword>committed</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>uncommitted</languageKeyword>, or <languageKeyword>all</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: If you omit this parameter, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> returns the list of committed blocks.
trans-unit.target: If you omit this parameter, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> returns the list of committed blocks.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>timeout</parameterReference> parameter is expressed in seconds.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>timeout</parameterReference> parameter is expressed in seconds.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="9ae411fa-1495-42a0-bc26-c41ebca9d5b8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for Blob Service Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="9ae411fa-1495-42a0-bc26-c41ebca9d5b8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for Blob Service Operations</link>.

trans-unit.target: The following table describes required and optional request headers.

trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>Date</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>x-ms-date</parameterReference>
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>Date</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>x-ms-date</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.target: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Required for all authenticated requests, optional for anonymous requests.
trans-unit.target: Required for all authenticated requests, optional for anonymous requests.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: If this header is specified, the operation will be performed only if both of the following conditions are met:
trans-unit.target: If this header is specified, the operation will be performed only if both of the following conditions are met:

trans-unit.source: The blob's lease is currently active.
trans-unit.target: The blob's lease is currently active.

trans-unit.source: The lease ID specified in the request matches that of the blob.
trans-unit.target: The lease ID specified in the request matches that of the blob.

trans-unit.source: If this header is specified and both of these conditions are not met, the request will fail and the operation will fail with status code 412 (Precondition Failed).
trans-unit.target: If this header is specified and both of these conditions are not met, the request will fail and the operation will fail with status code 412 (Precondition Failed).

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.

trans-unit.source: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.
trans-unit.target: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="1727932c-8a3b-4502-86ac-c89931d54bac" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">About Storage Analytics Logging</link> and <externalLink><linkText>Azure Logging: Using Logs to Track Storage Requests</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/windowsazurestorage/archive/2011/08/03/windows-azure-storage-logging-using-logs-to-track-storage-requests.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="1727932c-8a3b-4502-86ac-c89931d54bac" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">About Storage Analytics Logging</link> and <externalLink><linkText>Azure Logging: Using Logs to Track Storage Requests</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/windowsazurestorage/archive/2011/08/03/windows-azure-storage-logging-using-logs-to-track-storage-requests.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.target: Sample Request

trans-unit.source: The following sample request URI returns the committed block list for a blob named MOV1.avi:
trans-unit.target: The following sample request URI returns the committed block list for a blob named MOV1.avi:

trans-unit.source: The following sample request URI returns both the committed and the uncommitted block list:
trans-unit.target: The following sample request URI returns both the committed and the uncommitted block list:

trans-unit.source: The following sample request URI returns the committed block list for a snapshot.
trans-unit.target: The following sample request URI returns the committed block list for a snapshot.

trans-unit.source: Note that a snapshot consists only of committed blocks, so there are no uncommitted blocks associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Note that a snapshot consists only of committed blocks, so there are no uncommitted blocks associated with it.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body containing the list of blocks.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body containing the list of blocks.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response Headers
trans-unit.target: Response Headers

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Response header
trans-unit.target: Response header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: The date/time that the blob was last modified.
trans-unit.target: The date/time that the blob was last modified.

trans-unit.source: The date format follows RFC 1123.
trans-unit.target: The date format follows RFC 1123.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="d4f67d84-a51c-4ff7-8bd0-0ae206c9e3c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Representation of Date/Time Values in Headers</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="d4f67d84-a51c-4ff7-8bd0-0ae206c9e3c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Representation of Date/Time Values in Headers</link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: This header is returned only if the blob has committed blocks.
trans-unit.target: This header is returned only if the blob has committed blocks.

trans-unit.source: Any operation that modifies the blob, including updates to the blob's metadata or properties, changes the last modified time of the blob.
trans-unit.target: Any operation that modifies the blob, including updates to the blob's metadata or properties, changes the last modified time of the blob.

trans-unit.source: The ETag for the blob.
trans-unit.target: The ETag for the blob.

trans-unit.source: This header is returned only if the blob has committed blocks.
trans-unit.target: This header is returned only if the blob has committed blocks.

trans-unit.source: The MIME content type of the blob.
trans-unit.target: The MIME content type of the blob.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <languageKeyword>application/xml</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: The default value is <languageKeyword>application/xml</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: The size of the blob in bytes.
trans-unit.target: The size of the blob in bytes.

trans-unit.source: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.
trans-unit.target: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the version of the Blob service used to execute the request.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the version of the Blob service used to execute the request.

trans-unit.source: This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and later.
trans-unit.target: This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and later.

trans-unit.source: This header is also returned for anonymous requests without a version specified if the container was marked for public access using the 2009-09-19 version of the Blob service.
trans-unit.target: This header is also returned for anonymous requests without a version specified if the container was marked for public access using the 2009-09-19 version of the Blob service.

trans-unit.source: Note that only the committed block list can be returned via an anonymous request.
trans-unit.target: Note that only the committed block list can be returned via an anonymous request.

trans-unit.source: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.
trans-unit.target: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.

trans-unit.source: This operation also supports the use of conditional headers to get the block list only if a specified condition is met.
trans-unit.target: This operation also supports the use of conditional headers to get the block list only if a specified condition is met.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="36087161-9e7c-47e4-904c-3392cc35a8e9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Specifying Conditional Headers for Blob Storage Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="36087161-9e7c-47e4-904c-3392cc35a8e9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Specifying Conditional Headers for Blob Storage Operations</link>.

trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: The format of the response body for a request that returns only committed blocks is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the response body for a request that returns only committed blocks is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The format of the response body for a request that returns both committed and uncommitted blocks is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the response body for a request that returns both committed and uncommitted blocks is as follows:

trans-unit.source: Sample Response
trans-unit.target: Sample Response

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <parameterReference>blocklisttype</parameterReference> parameter was set to <languageKeyword>committed</languageKeyword>, so only the blob's committed blocks are returned in the response.
trans-unit.target: In the following example, the <parameterReference>blocklisttype</parameterReference> parameter was set to <languageKeyword>committed</languageKeyword>, so only the blob's committed blocks are returned in the response.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <parameterReference>blocklisttype</parameterReference> parameter was set to <languageKeyword>all</languageKeyword>, and both the blob's committed and uncommitted blocks are returned in the response.
trans-unit.target: In this example, the <parameterReference>blocklisttype</parameterReference> parameter was set to <languageKeyword>all</languageKeyword>, and both the blob's committed and uncommitted blocks are returned in the response.

trans-unit.source: In this next example, the <parameterReference>blocklisttype</parameterReference> parameter was set to <languageKeyword>all</languageKeyword>, but the blob has not yet been committed, so the <languageKeyword>CommittedBlocks</languageKeyword> element is empty.
trans-unit.target: In this next example, the <parameterReference>blocklisttype</parameterReference> parameter was set to <languageKeyword>all</languageKeyword>, but the blob has not yet been committed, so the <languageKeyword>CommittedBlocks</languageKeyword> element is empty.

trans-unit.source: Authorization
trans-unit.target: Authorization

trans-unit.source: If the container's ACL is set to allow anonymous access, any client may call <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>; however, only committed blocks can be accessed publicly.
trans-unit.target: If the container's ACL is set to allow anonymous access, any client may call <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>; however, only committed blocks can be accessed publicly.

trans-unit.source: Access to the uncommitted block list is restricted to the account owner and to anyone using a Shared Access Signature that has permission to read this blob or its container.
trans-unit.target: Access to the uncommitted block list is restricted to the account owner and to anyone using a Shared Access Signature that has permission to read this blob or its container.

trans-unit.source: Call <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> to return the list of blocks that have been committed to a block blob, the list of blocks that have not yet been committed, or both lists.
trans-unit.target: Call <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> to return the list of blocks that have been committed to a block blob, the list of blocks that have not yet been committed, or both lists.

trans-unit.source: Use the <parameterReference>blocklisttype</parameterReference> parameter to specify which list of blocks to return.
trans-unit.target: Use the <parameterReference>blocklisttype</parameterReference> parameter to specify which list of blocks to return.

trans-unit.source: The list of committed blocks is returned in the same order that they were committed by the <link xlink:href="c864893e-d758-475a-b419-af0c60dd2569" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Block List</link> operation.
trans-unit.target: The list of committed blocks is returned in the same order that they were committed by the <link xlink:href="c864893e-d758-475a-b419-af0c60dd2569" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Block List</link> operation.

trans-unit.source: No block may appear more than once in the committed block list.
trans-unit.target: No block may appear more than once in the committed block list.

trans-unit.source: You can use the uncommitted block list to determine which blocks are missing from the blob in cases where calls to <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> have failed.
trans-unit.target: You can use the uncommitted block list to determine which blocks are missing from the blob in cases where calls to <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> have failed.

trans-unit.source: The list of uncommitted blocks is returned beginning with the most recently uploaded block to the oldest uploaded block.
trans-unit.target: The list of uncommitted blocks is returned beginning with the most recently uploaded block to the oldest uploaded block.

trans-unit.source: If a block ID has been uploaded more than once, only the most recently uploaded block appears in the list.
trans-unit.target: If a block ID has been uploaded more than once, only the most recently uploaded block appears in the list.

trans-unit.source: Note that when a blob has not yet been committed, calling <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> with <codeInline>blocklisttype=all</codeInline> returns the uncommitted blocks, and the <languageKeyword>CommittedBlocks</languageKeyword> element is empty.
trans-unit.target: Note that when a blob has not yet been committed, calling <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> with <codeInline>blocklisttype=all</codeInline> returns the uncommitted blocks, and the <languageKeyword>CommittedBlocks</languageKeyword> element is empty.

trans-unit.source: <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> applies only to block blobs.
trans-unit.target: <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> applies only to block blobs.

trans-unit.source: Calling <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> on a page blob results in status code 400 (Bad Request).
trans-unit.target: Calling <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Get Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> on a page blob results in status code 400 (Bad Request).
